text: SummerSlam (2013) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by WWE. It was held on August 18, 2013 at the Staples Center in Los Angeles, California. It was the twenty-sixth yearly SummerSlam event that the WWE held. ==Matches== # Matches Stipulations Times SummerSlam Kickoff (Pre-show) Rob Van Dam (with Mark Henry and Big Show) defeated Dean Ambrose (c) (with Seth Rollins and Roman Reigns) by disqualification Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 13:38 1 Bray Wyatt (with Luke Harper and Erick Rowan) defeated Kane Ring of Fire match 07:49 2 Cody Rhodes defeated Damien Sandow Singles match 11:09 3 Alberto Del Rio (c) defeated Christian by submission Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 12:29 4 Natalya (with The Funkadactyls Cameron and Naomi) defeated Brie Bella (with Eva Marie and Nikki Bella) by submission Singles match 04:19 5 Brock Lesnar (with Paul Heyman) defeated CM Punk No Disqualification match 25:17 6 Dolph Ziggler and Kaitlyn defeated Big E Langston and AJ Lee Mixed tag team match 6:45 7 Daniel Bryan defeated John Cena (c) Singles match for the WWE Championship with Triple H as special guest referee 26:34 8 Randy Orton defeated Daniel Bryan (c) Singles match for the WWE Championship with Triple H as special guest referee (Orton cashed in his Money in the Bank) 00:08 (c) â€“ refers to the champion(s) heading into the match ==References== ==Other websites== *Official SummerSlam 2013 website Category:2013 in professional wrestling Category:SummerSlam Category:Sports in Los Angeles Category:2013 in California Category:2010s in Los Angeles, California Category:August 2013 events
title: SummerSlam (2013)
